attributes.action: make estate agents pass a degree level exam before being able to act as one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would create a professional service to the home seller and buyer instead of the sloppy, 3rd rate service provided by substandard charlatans we currently have.

It would also reduce the stress of buying and selling a house as you're entire lives saving wouldn't be in the hands of idiots.
